title: Becoming A Tradesman
sample: I've set off on three new endeavors of mastery. One, I'm gonna learn how to rap -- I know...you'll believe it when you hear it. And you will. Two, I'm gonna contribute my years of studio experience to the Philly music scene by offering live, multi-track recordings of local bands. It kinda sucks to absolutely nail one (or all) of your songs one night
